TEXT.S:
= Leyoxen =
Tnhangan alang Alang Ri-yo-hen.
Thuyang alang Kingal seejiq Ma-pa-ara-ya-cyun ka Ri-yo-hen-se, gaga nniq truma alang Aw-hwa(kika he-pin-si cwo-an).
Nniqan alang I-ran-syeyn Nan-aw-syang Cin-yuey-cun, Aw-Hwa cun, Han-si-cun.
Klbangan Kndkilan lnglingay Kklaan ppanan Mlutuc syusan teyn-c Nniqan seejiq alang Seejiq Atayal.
Skari kari Atayal, Tlu.
Snhiyaan Pnyahan alang Brah han o nniq babaw yayung Syaw-wa ka Ri-yo-hen, knhdyaqan dha Syang-kung-swo ga wada saw niqan 34km ka nniqa dha alang dgiyaq, dhiyaq bi ka alang ni
